description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5nr7g","text":"This protocol is used to extract genomic DNA from 0.22Î¼l sterivex filters using Phenol-Chlorophorm. The protocol is part of the Hakai Institute's pipeline to analyze microbial and environmental DNA from seawater samples and is implemented as a standard procedure for ongoing sampling programs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cg61u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hnqs","text":"BACKGROUND

This document describes the required protocol to to filter seawater onto a 0.22 micrometer Sterivex filters using paristaltic pump setup.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"feusg","text":"
Method description and rationale

Thiswater filtration is part of the standard best - practice method for analysing microbial and environmental DNA from seawater samples at the Hakai Institutes Genome Lab. The method is part of a pipeline that includes seawater filtration, DNA extraction, and amplicon sequencing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":1,"length":32}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2rv31","text":" 
Spatial coverage and environments of relevance

The protocol has been used to analyze water samples (commonly 2L) from all parts of the water columns, nearshore and offshore stations on the coast of British Columbia, Canad.  The protocol is also designed to target a broad range of organisms and has been used for the downstream analysis of Bacteria, Protists, Zooplankton, and Fish - using 16S rRNA, 18S rRNA, COI and 12S respectively.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":2,"length":46}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54iso","text":"
Personnel Required
 1 Technician
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":1,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f7u1g","text":"Safety

Identify hazards associated with the procedure and specify protective equipment and safety training required to safely execute the procedure!
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"20rjr","text":"Training requirements

Sterile technique, pipetting skills. Work-safe laboratory practices.
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4joqf","text":"Time needed to execute the procedure","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":36}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6fovc","text":"The set-up, filtration, and clean-up steps each take about 20-30 minutes. If using two","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ftpe","text":"peristaltic pumps simultaneously, up to 8 samples may be filtered at the same steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2cr4t","text":"Thaw filters on ice, if applicable. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5p1dq","text":"Replace Parafilm on each sample if needed. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dcmpu","text":"Prepare extraction negative - add   of SLB or Longmireâs buffer (filter-sterilized and UVed) into a new Sterivex. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"65qs6","text":"Seal bottom with parafilm and top with cap or parafilm, treat same as rest of samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1800","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"l6fg","text":"Add   lysozyme (125 mg fully dissolved in 1000 Î¼l 1 x TE) and   RNase A (10 Âµg/ml: 1ÂµL in 999ÂµL 1 x TE) to each filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":62,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"351c0","text":"Reseal the top with Parafilm or a luer cap.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ujtm","text":"Incubate Sterivex in a rotating incubator at   for   (in labelled 50 ml falcon tubes).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":45,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7jkb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2mujo","text":"Incubate at    for 1-2 hours in a rotating incubator (in 50ml falcon tubes; be sure to keep the same falcon tube for the same sterivex throughout these incubation steps).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":12,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e8khc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"20","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":15}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"55","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"63sqo","text":"Remove lysate from sterivex filter using a 10cc syringe into a labeled 15 ml falcon tube, use a new syringe for each sample. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6k7g0","text":"Do not pull up on theplunger while sterivex is attached. You will likely need to do multiple plunges to completely empty the Sterivex, so unscrew the syringe from the filter, pull back the plunger, reattach to Sterivex, and push and hold to plunge liquid out of Sterivex. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":18},{"style":"italic","offset":21,"length":250}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fgbud","text":"Repeat as needed until (nearly) all liquid and foam are out of Sterivex. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6kb0q","text":"Add   sucrose lysis buffer (SLB), rotate Sterivex with your hands several times to rinse the filter out and then plunge out liquid as described above. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"123bb","text":"Pool this with the lysate in the 15 ml tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

Wait at least 10 minutes before opening the centrifuge. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"32rv4","text":"Transfer aqueous (top) layer into a new 15 ml falcon tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"12s6g","text":"Phenol:Chloroform is toxic when inhaled and has to be handled in a fume hood.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":360,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"so5","text":"Spin at 2500 g for   or until aqueous layer is clear with no debris. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c9jhv","text":"For the last wash, spin until 200 â 500 Î¼l remain in Amicon (typically 8-10 minutes). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36c88","text":"Note the final volume and transfer to a labeled 1.5 Î¼l Eppendorf tube.
